nodes.description: A skilled archer and mage from the Starlight clan.
An ancient fire-breathing dragon that guards a vast treasure hoard.
A bustling metropolis known for its magical academies and grand architecture.
An enchanted bow that never misses its target and whispers secrets of the wind to its wielder.
Defeat the fearsome dragon Fyreborn and claim its treasure for Silvermoon City.
An annual celebration in Silvermoon City where magical lanterns illuminate the night sky.
A powerful organization of mages dedicated to the study and preservation of magical knowledge.

links.description: Aria Starlight currently resides in Silvermoon City.
Aria Starlight wields the magical bow Whisperwind.
The quest involves slaying the dragon Fyreborn.
